name: Tree
description: Trees are large, woody plants with a main trunk and branches

name: Shrubs
description: Shrubs are smaller than trees, with multiple stems

name: Herbs
description: Herbs are non-woody plants, often short and making persistent above-ground stems

name: Vines
description: Vines are plants with trailing or climbing stems, requiring support

name: Grasses
description: Grasses are herbaceous plants with narrow leaves and jointed stems

name: Ferns
description: Ferns are non-flowering vascular plants with spore reproduction

name: Creepers
description: Creepers are plants that spread horizontally along the ground or other surfaces, rooting at nodes

name: Climbers
description: Climbers are plants with long, weak stems that need support to grow vertically, for example, Vines

name: Aquatic
description: Aquatic plants are plants growing in water or saturated soil

name: Bamboos
description: Bamboos are giant grasses with woody stems
